components: Input: For username/email and password fields.
login.code:
<form>
  <Input placeholder='Email' type='email' />
  <Input placeholder='Password' type='password' />
  <Checkbox label='Remember me' />
  <Button title='Login' />
</form>

form.code:
<form>
  <InputContainer>
    <Input placeholder='Your name' />
    <Input as='textarea' rows={4} placeholder='Your message' />
  </InputContainer>
  <Button title='Submit' />
</form>
